text: Darwyn Cooke (November 16, 1962 - May 14, 2016) was a Canadian comic book writer, artist, cartoonist and animator. He was born in Toronto, Ontario. He was known for his work on the comic books Catwoman, DC: The New Frontier, The Spirit and Richard Stark's Parker: The Hunter. Cooke died at his home in Florida after suffering from lung cancer on May 14, 2016, aged 53. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Florida Category:Canadian comics artists Category:Canadian animators Category:Canadian cartoonists Category:Writers from Toronto
title: Darwyn Cooke
